# The `MFPropsModifier` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An RAII based helper class to modify <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionproperties">MachineFunctionProperties</a> when running pass. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An RAII based helper class to modify <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionproperties">MachineFunctionProperties</a> when running pass.

Define a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mfpropsmodifier">MFPropsModifier</a> in PassT::run to set <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionproperties">MachineFunctionProperties</a> properly.

Definition at line 42 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepassmanager-h">MachinePassManager.h</a>.
